column1: Smoque BBQ////The line can be a bit of a wait
column2: but it is well worth it. That is
column3: is if you can withstand every single person exiting the place (the exit conveniently next to the line) thinking they are at amateur comedy night at the Apollo. My personal favorite was: "Oh no
column5: sorry about that (as they rub their belly)". About every third person out the door gave us that one... However
column6: for every person that made the obnoxious joke
column7: there was another behind them offering a supportive: "Don't worry it's worth the wait (also while they rub their belly; that is a consistent theme)". Â Overall
column8: if you haven't already been there
column9: I'm jealous of you that you get to go for the first time very soon...
